issues: Lack of visual hierarchy; headings could be more prominent.
Inconsistent date formatting (Year only for IndabaX but month/year for education).
Bullet points are sometimes missing periods at the end.
suggestions: Use a clear font hierarchy to distinguish between headings, subheadings, and body text. Increase the font size or boldness of headings.
Standardize the date formatting across all sections (e.g., MM/YYYY - MM/YYYY or YYYY - YYYY).
Ensure all bullet points in project and competition descriptions end with a period for consistency.

strengths: Demonstrated project leadership experience as technical manager.
weaknesses: Limited direct experience with server-side technologies mentioned in the job description (Node.js, Django, Spring Boot, specific SQL/NoSQL databases).
Skills listed as 'Beginner' (Machine Learning, Deep Learning) are not particularly relevant to the server-side focus.
Missing focus on database design or optimization.
suggestions: Tailor the projects section to highlight any aspect of the existing projects that demonstrate relevant skills, even indirectly (e.g., scalability considerations, API interactions).
Consider adding a small personal project related to the desired server-side skills using the technologies mentioned in the job description to show initiative and interest.
In the summary, emphasize problem-solving abilities and adaptability, highlighting the potential to quickly learn new technologies required for the role.

general.summary: The CV shows promise with its technical project and competition experience. However, it needs to be better tailored to highlight relevant skills and experience for a server-side development internship and address key technologies required for this role. Adding a small personal server-side project and refining the summary to emphasize adaptability are crucial.
top_priorities: Add a server-side focused project, however small.
Tailor project descriptions to highlight relevance to server-side development.
Emphasize willingness to learn new technologies.
